title: Very Superstitious with George Lopez
overview: In Very Superstitious with George Lopez, George goes across the country to cities and small towns to show the many ways we're all alikeâ€¦ through our superstitions. This is a personal passion project for George. He grew up in a very superstitious Mexican household and after years of bad luck in his personal life, he wants to get back in touch with what he learned as a kid by exploring the beliefs and superstitious rituals of others.We'll follow George as he travels across America and embeds himself with people of different cultures and unusual beliefs. He's out to discover what these superstitions us about ourselves and how deep down we're all at least a little superstitious.
